name: Zero Proof: Coconut Banana Smoothie
description: The market is saturated with post-workout beverages, powders and gels, all claiming some health benefit or another. None of them taste very good, and if ever there is a time you deserve a little reward, it's after knocking out a 10K. This potassium-rich smoothie comes together in less than five minutes, and is creamy, rich and satisfying.
recipeIngredient: 1 young coconut, water and meat removed and reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Place fresh coconut water and meat in the blender. The liquid should equal approximately 2 cups (16 ounces). If it's short, top up with water to equal 2 cups.
Add banana, dates, cocoa, and ice cubes, and blend until thoroughly mixed. Serve immediately.
